content: For the group segment, which continues to be - continues to make quarter-over-quarter improvements, our portfolio produced 103% of the group business in the fourth quarter of 2022 compared to Q4, 2019. Year-to-date, hotel EBITDA was approximately $46.5 million, representing an increase of 50.4% over full year 2021. Comparing fourth quarter performance to pre-pandemic levels, adjusted FFO represented more than an eight fold increase in adjusted FFO for the same quarter in 2019 and on a full year basis adjusted FFO represented a 104.3% of adjusted FFO for the full year 2019. Hotel EBITDA is projected in the range of $11.9 million to $12.5 million and at the midpoint of the range, this represents a 22.3% increase over the hotel EBITDA for the same quarter in the prior year.
